bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Rechargeable Batteries for Cellular Telephones
Redline
IEEE Standard for Rechargeable Batteries for Cellular Telephones - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 1725-2011(Revision to IEEE Std 1725-2006) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Criteria for design analysis for qualification, quality, and reliability of rechargeable lithium ion and lithium ion polymer batteries for cellular telephone applications are established. Also included are: battery pack electrical and mechanical construction, packaging technologies, pack and cell level charge and discharge controls, and overall system considerations.

Criteria for design analysis for qualification, quality, and reliability of rechargeable lithium ion and lithium ion polymer batteries for cellular telephone applications are established. Also included are: battery pack electrical and mechanical construction, packaging technologies, pack and cell level charge and discharge controls, and overall system considerations.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
